text: Cosy Starbucks outlet located inside a neighbourhood mall. Open concept and friendly deco. A little less crowded and more spacious compared to other outlets in the town area. Same quality for coffee, drinks and food.
friendly staff. do take note hard to find seats as poly students and school students take up 1 table each from 10am to 7pm. do order take out.
Many thanks to the staffs efficiency to make our purchase successfully on yesterday night despite long queue. Unlike Jurong point branch horrible

Spacious, clean and plenty of seats, especially in the morning. Baristas are polite and friendly as well. Located inside hillion mall just strategically located at the main level once you enter into the mall.

Terrible management for a weekend morning rush. I came before the crowd and my drinks wasn’t ready after 15mins. I check in with the staff is my drinks on the Q as those behind me has already gotten theirs. Without eye contact the reply was many drinks. I ask another lady nicely she ask me go and sit first. When my cold drink is ready they still refuse to serve me my hot earl grey tea what a sequence. 3 staff at 9am please request for more people if you guys can’t manage. The beautiful weekend to start off with a cup of nice drinks is spoilt by your team.
